translation.en: [man 2] So what do you think, Joe?
I don’t think that’s for me to say.
I mean, it’s a nice idea, but...
I feel that I was a nightmare.
I drove my family away. I--
I didn’t mean to, but there it is.
translation.ko: 그럴 의도는 없었지만 결과는 그렇게 됐죠

translation.en: there’s a hole inside me now.
But I know the work I’ve done. You’ve seen that.
translation.ko: 하지만 내가 한 일은 알아요 보셨잖아요

translation.en: I can’t do anything about before. That’s done.
translation.ko: 지난 일은 어쩔 수 없어요 이미 끝났죠

translation.en: But I can show people I’ve changed.
I can be their father again.
I have faith in you, Joe.
Would you like to take communion before you go?
[man] Mother’s got her soup line today late.
I think we expected to see you next week.
-Ah, she’d have meant to be here. -It’s okay.
Well, she’d have meant to be here.
Yeah. I couldn’t hump the lines anymore.
Look, uh, you know, such a long trip up there
and my back being what it is.
translation.ko: 허리도 안 좋아서 면회를 못 갔어

translation.en: They brought some of your stuff back when they closed your apartment.
It’s downstairs in your space if you wanna--
[automated voice] The number you’ve reached is not in service--
-[Joe] Where’d they move to? -[man] We don’t know.
We haven’t spoken to Elaine since you went up.
translation.ko: 네가 감옥에 가고 일레인과 만난 적이 없어

translation.en: [Joe] What about the girls? Birthdays? Christmas?
We are not in touch anymore.

translation.ko: - 넌 전화 안 했니? - 안 받았겠죠

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. I contested that fucking settlement.
A clean break now, Joe, while the girls are young.
translation.ko: 조, 이제 깨끗이 갈라섰어 아이들도 어리잖아

translation.en: It’s a shame, but maybe she’s right.
I’ve been indoors six years. Please.
I’ve been away because... Well, I had to be away.
translation.ko: 그동안 떠나있었던 건 그럴 이유가 있었어

translation.en: Well, it was, but I was sick and...
But now-- now I’m better, see, and we--
Melissa. Melissa, wait. Wait. I love you.
How did you get this number?
I know. I just wanted to talk to the girls.
Joe, you know that’s not allowed.
-I should be able to speak to my-- -Listen to me.
translation.ko: - 당연히 애들과 통화할... - 내 말 잘 들어

translation.en: -Shit. Scotty. Look at you. -Look at you.
translation.ko: - 스코티, 네 꼴 좀 봐 - 그 꼴은 어떻고요

translation.en: Goddamn. It’s good to see you.
Uh, get one, and put that on mine.
translation.ko: 한 잔 더 줘요, 내가 낼게요

translation.en: -That’s kind of you, man. Cheers. -Oh, it’s the least I can do.
translation.ko: - 고마워, 건배 - 이 정도는 당연한 거죠

translation.en: It’s the least I can do, man.
I figure you and Billy were-- you were like brothers,
translation.ko: 우리 형 빌리와... 형제 같은 사이였으니까 우리도 그런 거잖아요

translation.en: so that makes us like brothers, so...
translation.ko: 형제 같은 사이였으니까 우리도 그런 거잖아요

translation.en: I-- I just-- I wanted to say hey, welcome you back.
-Thanks, man. Good to see ya. -Give me a call.
You know, I come in here a lot, and I’m pretty sure I’ve never seen you before.
translation.ko: 여기 자주 오는데 본 적이 없는 것 같아요

translation.en: But it’s what’s under the hood that counts.
translation.ko: 하지만 안에 뭐가 있느냐가 중요한 거죠

translation.en: Not the paint job. The ride is just so--
translation.ko: 페인트칠 말고요 - 그래야 드라이브가... - 알았어요, 자동차 얘기네요

translation.en: wanna buy me a Sucker Punch?
I don’t know what that is.
No, I, uh-- I gotta go home.
That’s boring. Wanna give me a ride home at least?
[Joe] You sure this is the right way?
Yeah. It’s, uh, straight down there.
...I thought you were gonna try something with me.
translation.ko: 당신이 나한테 뭔가 할 줄 알았어요

translation.en: I’d say it’s good to see you again, but I feel sick just being this close.
translation.ko: 다시 만나서 반갑다고 해야겠지만 이렇게 가까이 있는 조차 역겨워

translation.en: -Nice to see you too, Dan. -Lieutenant Pleasant.
translation.ko: - 나도 만나서 반가워, 댄 - 플레전트 경위라고 불러

translation.en: Don’t you dare use the informal with me, you fucking degenerate.
translation.ko: 함부로 내 이름 부르지 마 이 배신자야

translation.en: You’re an everlasting disgrace to this department,
and if Officer Barnett wasn’t here,
I would tune you up myself on general principle.
Did Manny Vassey or any of his animals visit you inside?
translation.ko: 매니 배시나 그 똘마니들이 너 면회 간 적 있지?

translation.en: Was it worth it, selling your soul to them?
Look, Phil, this is not how I want--
One of those young men is in intensive care.
translation.ko: 그 아이 중 한 명은 중환자실에 있어요

translation.en: I don’t give a shit if they’re astronauts.
Put those assholes on the stand and watch ’em come apart like wet bread,
translation.ko: 그 녀석들을 증언대에 세우고 쩔쩔매는 꼴을 보려면요

translation.en: because you know exactly what this is.
They’re parked in the middle of nowhere with ninja weapons,
precisely where and when their girlfriend happens to get assaulted?
translation.ko: 여자 친구가 언제, 어디서 폭행당할지 알고 있어요?

translation.en: Now, your daughter built herself a cute little frame,
translation.ko: 따님께서 귀여운 장난을 한 것 같은데

translation.en: but there’s no way this ends in anything but a civil suit
translation.ko: 결국, 민사 소송으로 가고 소송에 이겨

translation.en: that buys me your fucking house.
translation.ko: 내가 검사님 집을 갖게 되지 않겠어요?

translation.en: I spoke with Cara just now.
She’s, uh, quite shaken by what happened.
Do you wish to press charges?
In light of the statement given by my--
regarding the events of this evening...
you have the right to press criminal battery charges
against the men who attacked you,
-and my office will issue arrest warrants. -[Joe] Hmm.
Ah, forget it. It’s in the past.
If I could change what happened, I would.
translation.ko: 할 수만 있다면 지난 일을 바꾸고 싶어요

translation.en: I just want everything to stay in the past.
Like you want Billy Caldwell to stay in the past?
translation.ko: 빌리 콜드웰을 과거에 묻어두고 싶은 것처럼요?
네 맘대로 안 돼 이 멍청이야

translation.en: I just passed a kid in the lot molesting his girlfriend
translation.ko: 1982년형 닷선 뒷좌석에서 여자 친구를 더듬는 놈을

translation.en: in the backseat of his ’82 Datsun.
Kind of impressed that Phil’s kid went for hard stuff like that.
translation.ko: 필의 딸이 그런 일을 꾸몄다는 게 놀라워

translation.en: She always seemed like kind of a flake to me.
But then the mother did leave after the, uh-- [whooshing]
translation.ko: 하지만 그 일 이후로 엄마가 떠나고...

translation.en: So that’s gotta be kind of rough.
You look like you lost a little weight. Usually all that starchy food they--
translation.ko: 살이 좀 빠진 것 같은데 - 주로 탄수화물을... - 댄, 하고 싶은 말이 뭐야?
- 주로 탄수화물을... - 댄, 하고 싶은 말이 뭐야?

translation.en: How’s that for manners after all I’ve done for you?
translation.ko: 널 위해 그렇게 애썼는데 태도가 그게 뭐야?

translation.en: Six years in county beats 12 years in the state house.
translation.ko: 카운티 감옥살이 6년이면 주 감옥 12년 수감보단 낫잖아

translation.en: Those boys down there would’ve spread you out like my crazy aunt’s quilt.
translation.ko: 주 감옥이었다면 넌 완전히 박살 났을 거야

translation.en: Yeah, that was Manny’s grease, not yours.
translation.ko: 네가 아니고 매니가 뇌물을 준 덕분이지

translation.en: -I didn’t ask for this. -So give it back.
translation.ko: 이걸 원했던 건 아니야 그럼 돌려주든가

translation.en: In the butt. Matter of time now.
Well, he had a good run. Junior can steer things now.
translation.ko: 잘 먹고 잘살았지 사업은 주니어가 하면 되고

translation.en: Well, I hate to break it to you, but you’re on the hook here, Joey.
translation.ko: 이런 얘기하기 싫지만 너 안 좋은 상황에 코가 꿰어있어
암으로 죽기 전에 당장, 지금도 늦었어

translation.en: Cravin’ salvation by way of confession.
Old Manny wouldn’t, but dying’s made him smaller.
translation.ko: 왕년의 매니라면 그렇지만 죽음을 앞두면 작아지지

translation.en: specifically the kinds of things that he might confess to.

translation.ko: 그래, 이제 감이 오는 것 같네

translation.en: You think Phil’s comment about Bill Caldwell was coincidental?
translation.ko: 필이 빌 콜드웰을 끄집어낸 게 우연 같아?
- 매니가 필과 얘기해? - 말도 안 되지?

translation.en: First he wants Phil hit, then his asshole’s melting
translation.ko: 처음엔 필을 죽이려고 하더니 암이 생기고 난 후

translation.en: and he wants to give him absolution.
Christ forgives. The sinner is saved. All of that.
Phil’s nudging him towards a deposition, and if he lives long enough, a grand jury.
translation.ko: 필은 매니가 증언을 하게 해서 가능하면 대배심까지 가겠지

translation.en: But even if not, you’d be inside so fast, your bunk would still be warm.
translation.ko: 대심원까지 못 가도 넌 금세 감옥으로 돌아가게 될 거야
이번에는 나도 해줄 수 있는 게 없어

translation.en: “We”? You got a turd in your pocket?
You know, Phil’s been trying to butt-fuck you since forever,
and if Manny sings, he can do it.
And if you do get keistered, I’d worry I’m next in line,
and let me tell you what ain’t gonna happen.
translation.ko: 절대로 일어나지 않을 일이 뭔지 말해줄게

translation.en: If I was gonna roll over,
wouldn’t I do that before serving my fucking time?
-I did the job they wanted-- -No, half the job. Semantics.
translation.ko: - 난 하라는 대로 했어 - 반 밖에 못했잖아

translation.en: -Fuck you. I took the fall. -[engine starts]
You be sure and send her some flowers now, son.
The point is, you left Phil breathing all those years ago,
translation.ko: 중요한 건, 네가 필을 살려뒀다는 거야

translation.en: or it wouldn’t be a problem now.
translation.ko: 그게 아니면 지금 아무 문제 없겠지

translation.en: The way I see it, it’s your mess.
But hey, I’m more into carrots than sticks, so...
translation.ko: 하지만 난 채찍보다 당근을 더 좋아하니까

translation.en: let’s talk about your girls instead.
Family court judge by the name of Winthrop
found himself “over-served” one evening a while back.
And he dented up the front of his Prius
translation.ko: 자기 프리우스 차가 한 노숙자의 두개골에 부딪혀

translation.en: with the skull of an address-free citizen.
You might say I helped him sweep that up.
And I know that he would fall all over himself doing me a favor in return.
translation.ko: 그래서 나한테 신세를 갚으려고 난리가 났어

translation.en: Like revising your custody deal, for instance,
translation.ko: 예를 들어, 네 딸의 양육권 문제 같은 거 말이야

translation.en: so you can see your daughters again.
translation.ko: 그럼 딸들을 다시 볼 수 있겠지

translation.en: What am I thinking? I gotta drive.
translation.ko: 술을 왜 마신 거지? 운전해야 하는데

translation.en: Manny goes. You get your girls back. That’s the carrot.
translation.ko: 매니가 없어지면 넌 딸을 되찾아 그게 당근이야

translation.en: The stick? Who wants to think about that?
Answer me on that if I call.
-Don’t make me come after you. -[engine starts]
Oh, I guess you needed the rest. That’s okay.
translation.ko: 휴식이 필요한 것 같아 그건 좋은 거야

translation.en: That was there already. From a door.
I’m sorry I wasn’t here when you arrived. I--
-I, uh-- I already told him. -It’s okay. It’s okay. [groans]
I was just wondering what are your plans for work.
translation.ko: 그냥 궁금한데 무슨 일을 할지 계획은 있니?

translation.en: [Joe] I haven’t been home a day yet.
translation.ko: 집에 온 지 하루도 안 됐어요

translation.en: Your first night home and you’re out till dawn
translation.ko: 집에 온 지 첫날 밤부터 아버지 트럭을 타고

translation.en: I just don’t want things going back to how they were.
Dad says you don’t speak to your grandchildren.
We just want what’s best for them.
It’s impossible to you that I might have changed?
translation.ko: 내가 새사람이 됐다는 걸 못 믿으세요?

translation.en: I have to see Phil Coakley.
And everybody there sees me seeing him.
Have you ever thought what that might feel like... to me?
translation.ko: 그게 나한테 어떤 건지 생각해본 적 있니?

translation.en: You expect me to be impressed ’cause you didn’t drink in jail?
translation.ko: 감옥에서 술 마시지 않았다고 내가 놀라워해야 해?

translation.en: You say you’ve changed. Good. I hope it’s true.
I’ve prayed for it long enough.
I’m happy you’re home, and I love you,
but you don’t get extra points for doing what’s simply required,
translation.ko: 모두가 다 하는 당연한 일을 했다고

translation.en: -I can’t believe this shit. -You have work to do, Joe!
translation.ko: - 정말 너무하시네요 - 조, 넌 해야 할 일이 있어

translation.en: Bill Caldwell. Billy was my friend.
And I just wish he’d-- he’d...
I was out of line, the way I spoke to you last night.
I thought about this a lot,
what I wanted to say to you when I finally saw you,
What I did wanna say was that I am profoundly sorry.
I was truly in fear for my life.
I felt I was defending myself,
I don’t even remember it. Insane.
translation.ko: 기억도 안 나요 정신이 나갔던 거죠

translation.en: You were in fear for your life or you don’t remember.
translation.ko: 생명의 위협을 느꼈나요 아니면 기억이 안 나나요?

translation.en: The point is, I do take responsibility,
and I’m ready to move ahead with a-- with a clean life, a good life.
translation.ko: 앞으로 깨끗하고 착하게 살 준비가 됐다는 거죠

translation.en: He was my friend. I loved him.
I just wish he’d gotten into the program like I have,
There’s a whole other world you can live in.
translation.ko: 완전히 다른 세상에서 살 수 있었지만

translation.en: You are within 100 yards of my home here.
translation.ko: 내 집에서 91m 거리 안에 들어와 있군요

translation.en: But I’m not interested in some chickenshit restraining order violation.
translation.ko: 하지만 그따위 접근 금지 명령에는 관심 없어요

translation.en: For you, I want the needle.
He took care of me in there.
You’re on the same drugs as me.
That’s not something I thought I’d ever hear you say.
Yeah, well, I don’t want ’em anymore.
And I warned you about the drinking and the drugs.
I should’ve listened, but since I didn’t...
I guess I was expecting someone to clip me in there,
-not pay me when I came out. -[laughs]
translation.ko: 출소해도 돈을 받지 못할 거로 생각했어요

translation.en: If you knew how much it cost
to sell that imperfect self-defense line. [laughs]
You blew our clean shot at him. Hmm.
But since you’d already taken care of Billy...
even though he went over to them...
Yeah, well, Junior has a lot of--
a lot of different ideas about a lot of things.
Funny you mention talking to Phil.
-Give me that fuckin’ thing. I hurt. -In a sec.
there’s this notion floating now that maybe Billy wasn’t an accident.
translation.ko: 빌리가 사고로 죽은 게 아니라는 말이 떠돈대요

translation.en: Are you talking to the DA? Huh?
You know, sometimes when I’m sleeping...
I think I see what hell looks like...
translation.ko: 지옥이 어떻게 생겼는지 보는 것 같은데

translation.en: and it ain’t fire and it ain’t devils.
And I ain’t no goddamn stool pigeon.
It’s been a tough few days, is all.
[Joe] He nodded out. Pressed the thing there and just...
translation.ko: 잠이 들었어요 저기 있는 걸 눌러서...

translation.en: It’s the pain. We upped the dosage.
We should probably let him rest.
So how is he-- I mean, it’s bad, huh?
Thank you for taking care of my friend.
You’re gonna sit there with your stupid fuckin’ shirt
translation.ko: 거지 같은 셔츠를 입고 거기 앉아서

translation.en: and tell me I can’t see my own father?
He just wants you to call first, Junior, that’s all.
-[boy] I thought we were gonna see Poppy. -[Joe] Wow.
[Junior] Go inside and play the quiet game, okay?
Oh, man. You guys are so big.
[Junior] Hey, close that door behind you. The A/C’s on, all right?
-Goddamn, they grow so fast. -Yeah, how you doin’, Joe?
translation.ko: - 정말 빨리 크네요 - 어떻게 지냈어, 조?

translation.en: Now, you lay there with your hands on your scrotum and you listen.
translation.ko: 사타구니 붙잡고 엎드려서 내 말 잘 들어

translation.en: and this family no longer has any use for dumb-fuck, grief-causing policemen.
translation.ko: 우리 가족에게 이제 멍청한 문제아 경찰은 필요 없어

translation.en: Now, you come around here again bothering my father,
and I’m gonna bring you down to my playroom.
Yeah. You know what happens there.
-All right. Come on. Let’s get up. -[groaning]
I think we’d all feel better if you moved on.
translation.ko: 너를 안 보면 모두 즐거워할 거야

translation.en: Any idea what Phil Coakley talks to your dad about?
translation.ko: 필 코클리가 아버지와 무슨 얘기를 했는지 알아요?

translation.en: Now, why would you say something like that?
I mean, all these years my father carries your crazy ass,
you’re implying he’s some kind of rat or something?
translation.ko: 지금까지 아버지가 널 챙겨줬는데 아버지가 밀고자라고 말하는 거야?

translation.en: All right. Yo, break this motherfucker’s mouth.
Uh, can I have a coffee, please?
No, thank you for taking care of my friend.
I moved from Montreal around two years ago.
Do you work there every day at Manny’s house?
And all of his-- I don’t know--
uh, medication and monitoring and all that, that’s all you?
translation.ko: 매니의 모든 걸... 그러니까... 약이나 검사 같은 것도 모두 책임지는 거네요?

translation.en: And another girl. We do split shifts.
translation.ko: 한 명 더 있어서 근무시간을 나누죠

translation.en: Wow. That must feel like a big responsibility.
I guess it is. I don’t feel overwhelmed.
But I’m good at helping people.
I guess your agency provides you
with supplies and medication and whatnot for there at the house.
translation.ko: 당신 회사에서 약이나 의료용품 같은 걸 제공해 주겠네요

translation.en: They had him on so much different stuff there.
he didn’t know what day it was.
Actually, I just moved back here myself.
I was, uh, doing some consulting--
And you, sir, are a worthless goddamn punk.
translation.ko: 당신은 아무 가치 없는 최악의 쓰레기야

translation.en: I think I’m gonna skip this one.
Do you think you might wanna get together again?
Like I said, everyone’s gone now, and...
You know, if you want, I could set you up with Toni.
You know we take care of cops here.
Bring that pussy over here, girl. Yeah.
Hell, your old buddy, he’s on a weekly.
translation.ko: 네 옛 친구는 1주일에 한 번씩 해

translation.en: [man] Come on. Come on. What’s wrong? Hey!
Bruno. Fuck. Get that fucker out of here.
They got this whole jealousy thing going.
Anyway, if you wanna spend some time with Toni, it’s on me.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 토니와 자고 싶으면 말만 해

translation.en: [man on TV] Marion Barry tonight delegated many of his duties
as mayor of the nation’s capital but did not resign.
translation.ko: 많은 업무를 위임했지만 직책을 사임하지 않았습니다

translation.en: The word of this came hours
after the DC mayor was brought before a federal magistrate--
translation.ko: 연방 판사에게 소환된 이후 이 소식이 전해졌습니다

translation.en: Oh, Dad-- Dad said it was fine.
Where have you been all day? And why are you rushing in like this?
translation.ko: 종일 어디 있었니? 왜 이렇게 뛰어들어와?

translation.en: For your information, I went to a meeting.
Where was the meeting you were at?
We’re not gonna do things like this. I’m telling you right now.
translation.ko: 이렇게 살 수 없어 그건 확실해

translation.en: -I’m doing everything I can! -All right, okay.
I wish I could believe you, Joe, but you make it so hard.
translation.ko: 너를 믿고 싶지만 그럴 수 없게 만들잖아

translation.en: No. You make it so hard, because you don’t want to believe in me.
translation.ko: 어머니가 그렇게 만들어요 나를 믿지 않잖아요
네 말을 믿어보려는 거지 널 믿지는 않아

translation.en: What difference does it make when you’re determined to judge me?
translation.ko: 너한테 책임이 있어 날 비난하려고만 하는데 그게 무슨 상관이죠?

translation.en: Could I have some support here, please?
Fuck it. I’ll be gone soon anyway.
This behavior is precisely why you lost your family, Joseph!
translation.ko: 이래서 네가 가족을 잃은 거야, 조지프

translation.en: Like I said, I like you.
-Why does anyone do anything? -I don’t know.
Do you ever feel like you’re living in the wrong skin?
Sometimes I’ll wake up in the middle of the night and I’ll go to get a glass of water,
translation.ko: 때로 한밤중에 깨어나서 물을 마시러 가요

translation.en: and I’ll just catch myself in the mirror, and I don’t recognize myself at all.
translation.ko: 그러다 거울을 보면 내가 아닌 것 같아요

translation.en: It’s like someone else has come into my bathroom and just stood there.
translation.ko: 딴 사람이 내 화장실에 와서 서 있는 것 같죠

translation.en: Does that ever happen to you?
I-- [clears throat] I’m just gonna go...
Do you-- Do you want a drink or something?
[Joe] I think everything happens for a reason, you know?
I’ve been having kind of a hard time.
Do you have any other clients?
I noticed you had, I don’t know, looked like, uh...
translation.ko: 제약 회사를 차릴 만큼 많은 약이 있는 걸 봤어

translation.en: The reason I ask is because, before I moved back,
one of the firms I was consulting for had this guy--
No, it’s true. He was-- Really--
Your picture was in the paper.
“Slash Cop,” it said, which just is...
Coming home from a place downtown.
Apparently I bumped into him, the lawyer.
There was a fight, and I hurt him. Badly.
translation.ko: 싸움이 일어났고 그를 심하게 다치게 했어

translation.en: -It said you had a knife. -I thought he was gonna--
It was dark, and I-I-I, um--
Because I know what it means to need a second chance.
translation.ko: 또 한 번의 기회가 필요하다는 게 어떤 의미인지 알아

translation.en: And I didn’t know you when you did those things.
[Dan on phone] Didn’t wake your girl, did I?
I was hoping I would’ve heard some sort of “In Memoriam” item by now
translation.ko: 지금쯤 우리 후원자의 죽음을 애도하는 추도사를

translation.en: I fucking tried. Junior was there.
I can’t get that close again.
If anything other than cancer happens to Manny,
I’ll be the first one he comes after.
Put in some work instead of gettin’ your dick wet.
translation.ko: 여자랑 그 짓만 하지 말고 고민을 하란 말이야

translation.en: I was working. She’s the nurse there.
-Oh. Good thinkin’. -Yeah. Except that won’t work either.
[sighs] All that matters is that there isn’t a case brought against you.
translation.ko: 너를 기소할 사건이 없어야 한다는 게 중요해

translation.en: Phil is the only one eager to throw bombs,
and everybody else knows that the Vasseys are good for business.
translation.ko: 모두 배시 집안이 사업에 도움이 되는 걸 알아

translation.en: So if you can’t clip Manny, clip the mutant.
translation.ko: 매니가 어려우면 칼자국 난 놈을 처리해

translation.en: There’s no time left. Just make it look right, is all.
[Joe’s mom] Joe! Pick up the phone. It’s for you.

translation.ko: - 조지프 덴턴 씨인가요? - 네 브래들리 출소자 관리팀의 앤서니 겟먼입니다

translation.en: You have your office check-in and urinalysis appointment today.
Yes, sir. I’ll be right there.
-Oh, hey, man. Come on up. -[door buzzes]
The, uh, reserves piss test randomly, so I, uh...
translation.ko: 예비군도 무작위로 소변 검사해요 그래서 나는...

translation.en: Hey, Joe, can I ask you something straight up?
Back then was there ever any, uh--
any talk about what happened to Billy maybe wasn’t an accident?
translation.ko: 빌리가 사고를 당한 게 아니라는 말이 있었어요?

translation.en: we all know he was a lush, but falling asleep on the tracks?
translation.ko: 술에 절어 살긴 했지만 기차선로에서 잠들었다는 건...

translation.en: Wasn’t my case, but I knew the guys who drew it. They worked it right.
translation.ko: 내가 맡은 사건은 아니지만 제대로 처리했을 거야

translation.en: Phil Coakley called me. He wants me to come in.
He said they’re gonna impanel a grand jury and, uh, reopen it as a homicide.
“New information” is all he would say.
It’s like he wanted to dangle it in front of my face.
translation.ko: 나한테 직접 보여주고 싶은 것 같아요

translation.en: Whatever Phil says he’s got, it’s smoke. He’s fishing.
translation.ko: 필이 뭐라 하든 다 속임수야 낚시하는 거지

translation.en: He’s got a hard-on for the Vasseys. Always has.
maybe he’d been around the tracks that night.
translation.ko: 그날 밤에 철로 근처에 있었을지도 모르지

translation.en: But they could never back it up. It was what it was.
translation.ko: 하지만 증거가 없어 그냥 그렇게 됐던 거야

translation.en: A shitty accident, like you said.
I was glad when you fucked him up.
This thing works pretty good, huh?
Now, I didn’t wake up in this mood.
I was thinking, “Don’t worry. My pal Joey will carry his water on this thing.”
translation.ko: '걱정하지 마, 내 친구 조이가 알아서 해결할 거야' 그랬지

translation.en: But then I hear, uh, no.
This Caldwell grand jury is, uh, in motion after all.
-I know. -Did I tell you time was short?
Did I tell you what was coming? And what did you do but fuck around.
translation.ko: 이렇게 될 거라고 말했는데 여자랑 놀아나기만 했어

translation.en: I’ll just take my chances in court.
Buddy, you know I wouldn’t be able to let you do that.
Well, that either. Do I need to recharge your battery?
translation.ko: 그것도 안 돼 한 번 더 쏴줄까?

translation.en: F-Fu-- I can’t do Manny. I can’t do Phil.
You name a third way or get the fuck out.
I just bought a new gas grill.
Stainless steel. Got an infrared system on it.
To be honest, I don’t even know what that means.
But if you think that I wouldn’t buy some crackhead nigger
translation.ko: 하지만 내가 마약에 찌든 흑인 놈한테

translation.en: for 500 bucks to come into your parents’ house
translation.ko: 5백 달러를 주고 네 부모님 집에 보내서

translation.en: and slit their throat while they sleep...
translation.ko: 자는 두 분의 목을 그으라고 못 시킬 것 같아?

translation.en: if it meant that I got to keep that grill, you got me mixed up with somebody else.
translation.ko: 내 것을 지키기 위해선 난 뭐든지 할 수 있는 놈이야

translation.en: Now, you fix it before then, or I’ll assume that we’re at odds.
translation.ko: 그 전에 해결하든지 아니면 우린 끝이야

translation.en: And then-- [huffs] goddamn, everything’s on the table.
And I really do like your folks.
Hey, hey, hey. How you feelin’ today?
Do you know, I was thinking maybe I’d want to talk to Toni.
So you know when she sees Dan then?
I was talking about Phil Coakley.
How else do you think that Frankenstein motherfucker’s getting any pussy?
translation.ko: 아니면 그 괴물 같은 놈이 어디서 여자를 만나겠어?

translation.en: He had a retainer on number 27, on account of it’s a queen size.
-Can you get him to see you again? -I don’t wanna see him.
translation.ko: 다시 만나자고 할 수 있어? 만나고 싶지 않아요

translation.en: [Joe] I think I can do it.
[Dan on phone] Good boy. Which one?
I got a way to freeze Phil out. Nobody gets hurt.
translation.ko: 필의 약점을 잡으면 돼 누구도 다치지 않아

translation.en: Oh, girl, did I knock a fuse loose?
I can back him off. No grand jury, no Manny Vassey. It’s done.
translation.ko: 협박해서 대배심도 매니도 포기하게 하는 거지

translation.en: You must have a hell of a wedge.
Bradley’s most saintly public official. Solicitation, on tape.
translation.ko: 브래들리 최고의 성자 같은 공직자 성매매 비디오

translation.en: Phil’s still got some gas in his tank after all.
translation.ko: 아직도 그거 할 힘은 남아 있었네

translation.en: He is mighty precious about his reputation,
but, still, blackmail’s messy, you ain’t careful.

translation.ko: 누구도 죽지 않아도 돼 이게 깨끗하지

translation.en: [Toni] I told him I’d see him again if he laid off the Jesus.
translation.ko: 예수 얘기 안 하면 다시 만난다고 했어요

translation.en: He damn near jumped through the phone.
[commercial announcer] Taurus is the car you’ve been waiting for.
See the new look Taurus at a dealership near you.
[TV announcer] And now back to our Friday night presentation.
-[door slams open] -[man] Bitch, I knew it!
I read this while you were inside.
translation.ko: 네가 감옥에 있을 때 이걸 읽었어

translation.en: I didn’t know there was a name for it.
translation.ko: "자기애성 인격장애의 이해" 그런 이름이 있는지도 몰랐어

translation.en: I have always known since you were little...
translation.ko: 어렸을 때부터 너에게 문제가 있다는 걸

translation.en: And I didn’t do anything about it.
I’ve done a lot of soul-searching...
about my part in what happened to you.
-Dad, you didn’t do anything. -Let me finish.
translation.ko: 하지만 아무것도 안 했잖아요 끝까지 들어 봐

translation.en: I didn’t make you run with wild people.
I didn’t make you gamble all that money.
I didn’t make you take drugs or drink liquor
or be so goddamn angry all the time, Joe.
I knew how you were. I did nothing to help.
translation.ko: 네가 어떤지 알았지만 난 도와주지 못했다

translation.en: For that I am truly sorry.
But I’ve gotta do something about it now.
I will not have dirty money in my house.
translation.ko: 더러운 돈을 내 집에 둘 수 없어

translation.en: It’s not dirty money. It’s my money.
Who keeps that much money in a bag unless it’s dirty money?
translation.ko: 더러운 돈이 아니면 그 큰돈을 그렇게 보관해?

translation.en: You have no right to go through my stuff!
Where did it come from? Where?
What’s the difference? I’m leaving! You get your wish!
My wish is to have my son back.
-All right-- -I don’t know who you are!
have been in touch this whole time?
The best thing that ever happened to those girls
was to get away from their father.
[Joe’s mom] Remember, you had everything and you destroyed it all!
translation.ko: 넌 모든 걸 가졌었지만 네가 다 망쳤어

translation.en: [Joe] You’ll never hate me as much as I hate myself!
You don’t get to turn this into a little pity party!
This is beyond your little feelings!
[Joe] When did you ever care how I felt?
[Joe’s mom] That’s all I ever cared about! And I don’t hate you!
translation.ko: 난 그걸 걱정하는 거야 널 싫어하지 않아

translation.en: I hate what you’ve done to this family!
translation.ko: 네가 가족에게 한 짓을 싫어하는 거지

translation.en: Junior Vassey or-or Dan Pleasant. I don’t know.
You bring mayhem with you, Joe.
I got behind with my bookie.
It started slow, ya know, couple of Sundays of bad luck.
translation.ko: 천천히 시작됐지 몇 번 운이 안 좋았을 뿐인데

translation.en: Next thing I know, I’m underwater.
translation.ko: 정신을 차려보니 깊은 물 속에 있는 거야

translation.en: I kept thinking, “Aw, I’ll sort this out.”
when they look at me, when they look at my face, they’ll forgive me.”
translation.ko: '나를 보면, 내 얼굴을 보면 용서해 줄 거야'

translation.en: we did whatever Manny said, and he said, “Do terrible things.”
translation.ko: 매니가 하라는 대로 했어 '끔찍한 짓을 해'

translation.en: He’s gonna talk about all that now, Manny is, and when he does...
that prosecutor’s gonna give me the death penalty.
[sniffs] Assuming Dan doesn’t kill me first.
We’re not defined by our pasts.
You’ve remade yourself. You’ve chosen to be a good man.
translation.ko: 당신은 달라졌고 착한 사람이 되기로 했어

translation.en: It’s a choice. That’s all it is.
In prison, uh, there was a chaplain.
And he sat with me for-- for fuckin’ years.
I’m tellin’ ya, if someone tells you for that long that you can be forgiven...
translation.ko: 용서받은 거라고 그렇게 오래 누군가가 말하면

translation.en: You’re the only one who made me feel like maybe he was right.
translation.ko: 당연히 그 사람 말이 옳다고 믿게 돼

translation.en: you’re gonna see the playroom first.
Junior, you don’t have to do this. I-- I swear I’m gonna leave.
translation.ko: 주니어, 이럴 필요 없어요 정말 떠날 거예요

translation.en: What-Whatever Phil is gonna do with your Dad had--
He was a great man. A king.
Well, they’ll never be another one like him, right, fellas?
translation.ko: 그런 분은 앞으로도 없을 거야, 그렇지?

translation.en: Your girlfriend isn’t the most competent nurse I’ve ever seen.
translation.ko: 네 여자 친구는 그렇게 능력 있는 간호사도 아니었어

translation.en: Jesus Christ, you sound like she did. [laughs]
translation.ko: 빌어먹을, 그 여자하고 똑같은 소리를 내네

translation.en: But don’t worry. You’ll see her again.
[Junior] We’re gonna go in there together, you and me.
translation.ko: 우린 같이 갈 거야 너와 나

translation.en: We are gonna go down there and work it all out.
[Junior] We got all day, don’t we?
There’s nothing to work out. Uh--
I didn’t do anything. It wasn’t me.
translation.ko: 난 아무것도 안 했어요 내가 아니에요
그 여자는 그렇게 말 안 했어

translation.en: [Joe] We don’t have to do this. It wasn’t me.
-[thug speaks foreign language] -No. No. No, no, no!
translation.ko: - 알았어, 어서 - 안 돼 안 돼, 안 돼!

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no! No!
[Scotty] I see you, Junior! I see you back there, bitch!
translation.ko: 주니어, 널 봤어 거기 있는 걸 봤다고

translation.en: [Scotty laughs] There you go, Junior! There you go!
[Junior] Suck my cock, you fuckin’ retard!
[Joe] You hold on, okay? You just hold on.
you were like a brother to Billy.
That makes you like a brother to me, right?
Except he didn’t fall on any fucking train tracks, did he?
translation.ko: 하지만 형은 기차선로에서 넘어진 게 아니었죠?

translation.en: Junior... told you to do it.
I talked to Phil about it, you know?
-He’s not such a bad guy. -Did you--
Did you maybe take a shot at my house, Scotty?
Thought you said your plan was “no bodies.”
translation.ko: 죽이지 않고 해결하는 게 네 계획이라면서

translation.en: But I ain’t complainin’. You do some work on his brakes or what?
[Dan] Got into a smashup last night. Went up in smoke.
Now we’ll get started with the judge, get your girls back.
translation.ko: 이제 그 판사한테 얘기해서 딸들을 되찾아야지

translation.en: Yes, sir, a brand-new day, Joey. A brand-new day.
What are you doing with that?
-What are you doing with it? -I’m taking it to the girls.
translation.ko: - 그걸로 뭘 할 건데? - 애들한테 갖다 줄 겁니다

translation.en: -No, you’re not. -I’m not trying to buy them.
translation.ko: - 아니, 안 돼 - 돈으로 환심을 사는 게 아니라

translation.en: [sighs] See them once more, and then I’ll just-- No, you’re not.
translation.ko: - 얼굴만 보고 난... - 아니, 안 돼

translation.en: You are going nowhere near those girls.
Money, no money, I don’t care.
You will never be in proximity enough
that your damage and mayhem ever touches them, not even for a second.
translation.ko: 아이들에게 닿을 만큼 가까이 가면 안 돼

translation.en: I promise this to you, Son.
This will not happen if I am alive.
translation.ko: 내가 살아 있는 한 절대로 안 돼

translation.en: I said it will not happen.
